languages.text: {n}Несколько слов, переданных предводителям каторжан, возымели невероятный эффект. По незримому сигналу каторжане обернулись против культистов — сначала подстрекателей, а затем и бунтовщиков. Надзиратели, вышедшие из оцепления, с изумлением наблюдали, как, добившись победы, их "подопечные" покорно сложили оружие.{/n}

{n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько слов, переданных предводителям каторжан, возымели невероятный эффект. По незримому сигналу каторжане обернулись против культистов — сначала подстрекателей, а затем и бунтовщиков. Надзиратели, вышедшие из оцепления, с изумлением наблюдали, как, добившись победы, их "подопечные" покорно сложили оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. At an invisible signal, the convicts have turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The wardens, coming out of the cordon, watched with astonishment as their 'wards' have surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

{n}A few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. At an invisible signal, the convicts have turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The wardens, coming out of the cordon, watched with astonishment as their 'wards' have surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

The wardens, coming out of the cordon, watched with astonishment as their 'wards' plainly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

languages.text: {n}传达给囚犯领袖的短短几句话，产生了令人难以置信的效果。囚犯们的领袖下达了看不到的信号，随后所有囚犯纷纷将枪口对准了那些邪教徒，先是干掉了煽动分子，之后干掉了所有叛徒。监察员终于冲了出来，惊讶地看着他们的“守护者”战胜敌人之后主动缴械投降。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}传达给囚犯领袖的短短几句话，产生了令人难以置信的效果。囚犯们的领袖下达了看不到的信号，随后所有囚犯纷纷将枪口对准了那些邪教徒，先是干掉了煽动分子，之后干掉了所有叛徒。监察员终于冲了出来，惊讶地看着他们的“守护者”战胜敌人之后主动缴械投降。{/n}
{n}传达给囚犯领袖的短短几句话，产生了令人难以置信的效果。囚犯们的领袖下达了看不到的信号，随后所有囚犯纷纷将枪口对准了那些邪教徒，先是干掉了煽动分子，之后干掉了所有叛徒。监察员走出了警戒线，惊讶地看着他们的“守护者”战胜敌人之后主动缴械投降。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las pocas palabras que recibieron los líderes de los convictos tuvieron un efecto increíble. Con una señal invisible, los reclusos se volvieron contra los cultistas, primero los instigadores y luego los rebeldes. Los supervisores, finalmente capaces de salir del cerco, observaron con asombro a los presos entregar las armas tras salir victoriosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las pocas palabras que recibieron los líderes de los convictos tuvieron un efecto increíble. Con una señal invisible, los reclusos se volvieron contra los cultistas, primero los instigadores y luego los rebeldes. Los supervisores, finalmente capaces de salir del cerco, observaron con asombro a los presos entregar las armas tras salir victoriosos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受刑者のリーダーたちに伝えられたわずかな言葉が、信じられないほど大きな効果をもたらした。目に見えない合図で、受刑者たちは、魔女団に反旗を翻した...まずは扇動者、次に反逆者。防衛線から出てきた看守たちは、勝利を収めた後、自分たちの'収容者'たちが素直に武器を放棄する様子を、驚きながら見ていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受刑者のリーダーたちに伝えられたわずかな言葉が、信じられないほど大きな効果をもたらした。目に見えない合図で、受刑者たちは、魔女団に反旗を翻した...まずは扇動者、次に反逆者。防衛線から出てきた看守たちは、勝利を収めた後、自分たちの'収容者'たちが素直に武器を放棄する様子を、驚きながら見ていた。{/n}
{n}受刑者のリーダーたちに伝えられたわずかな言葉が、信じられないほど大きな効果をもたらした。目に見えない合図で、受刑者たちは、魔女団に反旗を翻した...まずは扇動者、次に反逆者。防衛線から出てきた看守たちは、勝利を収めた後、自分たちの'収容者'たちが素直に武器を放棄する様子を、驚きながら見ていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le message transmis aux chefs des détenus a un effet incroyable. Sur un signal invisible, les détenus se retournent contre les cultistes en commençant par les instigateurs de la révolte, puis en s'en prenant aux émeutiers eux-mêmes. Les contremaîtres, quittant leur périmètre de sécurité, sont surpris de voir les détenus se rendre et lâcher leurs armes après avoir remporté la victoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le message transmis aux chefs des détenus a un effet incroyable. Sur un signal invisible, les détenus se retournent contre les cultistes en commençant par les instigateurs de la révolte, puis en s'en prenant aux émeutiers eux-mêmes. Les contremaîtres, quittant leur périmètre de sécurité, sont surpris de voir les détenus se rendre et lâcher leurs armes après avoir remporté la victoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die wenigen Worte, die an die Anführer der Sträflinge weitergegeben wurden, hatten eine unglaubliche Wirkung. Auf ein unsichtbares Zeichen hin wandten sich die Sträflinge gegen die Kultisten ... zuerst die Rädelsführer, dann die Rebellen. Die Aufseher beobachteten voller Erstaunen, wie ihre 'Mündel' ihre Waffen niederlegten, nachdem sie den Sieg errungen hatten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die wenigen Worte, die an die Anführer der Sträflinge weitergegeben wurden, hatten eine unglaubliche Wirkung. Auf ein unsichtbares Zeichen hin wandten sich die Sträflinge gegen die Kultisten ... zuerst die Rädelsführer, dann die Rebellen. Die Aufseher beobachteten voller Erstaunen, wie ihre 'Mündel' ihre Waffen niederlegten, nachdem sie den Sieg errungen hatten.{/n}

{n}Die wenigen Worte, die an die Anführer der Sträflinge weitergegeben wurden, hatten eine unglaubliche Wirkung. Auf ein unsichtbares Zeichen hin wandten sich die Sträflinge gegen die Kultisten — zuerst die Rädelsführer, dann die Rebellen. Die Wörter, die aus der Absperrung kamen, sahen erstaunt zu, wie ihre 'Mündel' nach ihrem Sieg einfach die Waffen niederlegten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hükümlülerin liderlerine iletilen sözler, harikulade bir etkiye yol açtı. Görünmez bir işaretle önce kışkırtanlar, sonra da isyancılar saf değiştirerek tarikatçıların karşısına geçti. Nihayet kordonu yaran gözetmenler, galibiyetlerinin ardından sorunsuzca silah bırakan "mahkûmlarını" şaşkınlıkla izliyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The few words passed on to the leaders of the convicts had an incredible effect. On an invisible signal, the convicts turned against the cultists — first the instigators, and then the rebels. The overseers, finally able to break out of the cordon, watched in astonishment as their "wards" compliantly surrendered their weapons after emerging victorious.{/n}
